title: Step 9: Session History Persistence
description: Create src/history/sessionArchiver.ts. Beads-inspired JSONL + archive pattern. Snapshot team data periodically. Archive to .agent-teams-history/ when team cleanup detected. Append to sessions.jsonl index.

title: Step 2: Types & State Manager
description: Create src/types.ts with verified schemas (TeamConfig, TeamMember, AgentTask, InboxEntry, typed message interfaces). Create src/state/teamState.ts with TeamStateManager class (EventEmitter, Maps for teams/tasks/messages).

title: Step 7: Status Bar
description: Create src/statusBar/statusBarItem.ts. Right-aligned status bar item showing agent count and remaining tasks. Click to focus sidebar. Hide when no teams active.

title: Step 1: Project scaffolding
description: Create package.json, tsconfig.json, .gitignore, .vscodeignore, and src/extension.ts stub. Set up dependencies: @types/vscode, typescript, @vscode/vsce. Configure Activity Bar, views, commands, keywords in package.json.

title: Step 3: File Watcher
description: Create src/watchers/fileWatcher.ts. Watch ~/.claude/teams/ and ~/.claude/tasks/ using fs.watch. Poll for directory existence every 5s. Debounce file changes 300ms. Parse paths to route to correct handlers. Handle JSON parse errors gracefully.

title: Step 8: Extension Entry Point & Empty State
description: Wire up extension.ts: register all providers, status bar, file watcher in activate(). Dispose in deactivate(). Configure viewsWelcome in package.json for empty state.

title: Step 6: Message Tree View
description: Create src/views/messageTreeProvider.ts. Reverse chronological message feed. Parse stringified JSON in text field to detect typed messages. Show badges for idle/shutdown/permission. Click to expand full text.

title: Step 5: Task Tree View
description: Create src/views/taskTreeProvider.ts. Flat task list per team with status icons (checkmark, sync, lock, circle). Show owner name and blocked-by info. Refresh on taskUpdated event.

title: Step 10: Mock Data & Testing
description: Create mock data script using test-fixtures/ as reference. Verify F5 launch, all 3 views populate, file watching works, status bar updates, history archiving works.

title: Step 4: Agent Tree View
description: Create src/views/agentTreeProvider.ts. TreeDataProvider showing teams as root nodes, members as children. Color dots, lead crown icon, agent type labels. Refresh on teamUpdated event.
